response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance and quality. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $15,000. However, I understand that value can be subjective, so I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,500. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive an outstanding value while also allowing us to share this remarkable product with someone who appreciates its unique qualities. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 14500}
